Posts.Content: Hi there Just wondered if you had found out the Nolvadex availability in the UK?Â  Which brand of Tamoxifen are you taking here? I'm trying to find one that suits me, but I seem to get every side effect going, hot flushes, night sweats, joint and bone ache, weight gain, sleepless nights, grrrrr and need to get it sorted as I need to return to work soon. Thanks Fiona
Posts.Title: Nolvadex improved Side Effects as compared to Tamoxifen Brands available...
